game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find the ancient artifact hidden in the cave.
game.description: Embark on a thrilling adventure to retrieve the lost artifact. Legends say it possesses immense power and could change the course of history. Can you uncover its secrets?

task.description: The village elder has information about the location of the hidden cave. Approach him and gather the necessary details.
The cave is rumored to be pitch black. You need a reliable light source to navigate through its treacherous tunnels. Find a lantern from the local merchant in town.

task.objective: Brave the dangers of the cave
task.description: Enter the cave and face various obstacles, dangerous creatures, and puzzles. Be prepared for anything that comes your way!
Navigate deeper into the cave and locate the secret chamber where the artifact is said to be kept. Carefully unravel its mysteries and retrieve the artifact.
